data.comment: Goal! Swansea have got their heads in front thanks to a Jay Fulton strike.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a first substitution, with Angus Gunn replacing Adam Davies.
In the minute 51, Tommy Smith (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
Swansea's Matt Grimes has been booked in Swansea.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's second substitution at Liberty Stadium with Tyrese Campbell replacing Josh Tymon.
In the minute 74, Jake Bidwell is replacing Ryan Manning for the home team.
Swansea make their second substitution with Kasey Palmer replacing Yan Dhanda.
Ben Cabango is on a sub for Ryan Bennett for Swansea.
In the minute 81, Steven Fletcher is replacing Morgan Fox for Stoke at Liberty Stadium.
James McClean (Stoke) gets a yellow card.
Kasey Palmer is booked for the home team.
In the minute 87, Goal! Kasey Palmer extends Swansea's lead to 2-0 in Swansea with a header.
Great play from Jake Bidwell to set up the goal.
Angus Gunn (Stoke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has come to a close in Swansea. The final score is 2-0.
